api_list.name: Get Leagues

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter by `name`.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Filter by `type`.

optional_parameters.name: include
optional_parameters.description:
Enriching the response. Allow multiple values, separated by `,`.
Available options: `country`, `season`, `seasons`

optional_parameters.name: is_cup
optional_parameters.description: Filter by `is_cup`.

optional_parameters.name: country_ids
optional_parameters.description: Filter by `country_id`. Allow multiple values, separated by `,`.

optional_parameters.name: ids
optional_parameters.description: Filter by `id`. Allow multiple values, separated by `,`.

api_list.name: Get Fixtures (Matches)

optional_parameters.name: ids
optional_parameters.description: Filter by `id`. Allow multiple values, separated by `,`.

optional_parameters.name: visitorteam_ids
optional_parameters.description: Filter by `visitorteam_id`. Allow multiple values, separated by `,`.

optional_parameters.name: season_ids
optional_parameters.description: Filter by `season_id`. Allow multiple values, separated by `,`.

optional_parameters.name: league_ids
optional_parameters.description: Filter by `league_id`. Allow multiple values, separated by `,`.

optional_parameters.name: localteam_ids
optional_parameters.description: Filter by `localteam_id`. Allow multiple values, separated by `,`.

optional_parameters.name: round_ids
optional_parameters.description: Filter by `round_id`. Allow multiple values, separated by `,`.

optional_parameters.name: winner_team_ids
optional_parameters.description: Filter by `winner_team_id`. Allow multiple values, separated by `,`.

optional_parameters.name: stage_ids
optional_parameters.description: Filter by `stage_id`. Allow multiple values, separated by `,`.

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description:
Filter by `time.status`.

Available options:

- `FT`: Full-time
- `NS`: Not started 
- `CANCL`: Cancelled

optional_parameters.name: include
optional_parameters.description:
Enriching the response. Allow multiple values, separated by `,`.
Available options: `league`, `season`, `stage`, `round`, `localteam`, `visitorteam`

optional_parameters.name: starting_time_lte
optional_parameters.description:
Filter by `starting_time.timestamp`, which value is less-or-equal.
The value should be in UNIX timestamp, and be converted to UTC.

optional_parameters.name: starting_time_gte
optional_parameters.description:
Filter by `starting_time.timestamp`, which value is greater-or-equal.
The value should be in UNIX timestamp, and be converted to UTC.
